data.comment: Stephen Martin starts the match. Bristol City with the kick-off in Bristol.
Nahki Wells (Bristol City) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Ashton Gate.
The second half is underway in Bristol - Blackburn with the kick-off.
The away team replace Lewis Holtby with Tyrhys Dolan.
In the minute 76, Famara Diedhiou is replacing Antoine Semenyo for Bristol City at Ashton Gate.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Famara Diedhiou.
That's a fine assist from Chris Martin.
In the minute 86, Taylor Moore is replacing Nahki Wells for the home team.
Tony Mowbray (Blackburn) is making a second substitution, with Jacob Davenport replacing Joe Rothwell.
Tony Mowbray is making the team's third substitution at Ashton Gate with John Buckley replacing Sam Gallagher.
The home team have replaced Chris Martin with Adrian Mariappa. This is the third substitution made today by Dean Holden.
